definitions.definition: The power , right , or authority to interpret and apply the law .
The power or right to exercise authority.
The power or right to perform some action as part of applying the law.
The authority of a sovereign power to govern or legislate .
The limits or territory within which authority may be exercised.

main_definition: The power , right , or authority to interpret and apply the law .
secondary_definitions: The power or right to exercise authority.
The power or right to perform some action as part of applying the law.
The authority of a sovereign power to govern or legislate .
The limits or territory within which authority may be exercised.
